appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Display YouTube's player bar outside the video.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

tooltipText_toInside.description: Tooltip text for toggle button when extension is active

tooltipText_toOutside.description: Tooltip text for toggle button when extension is inactive

popup_title.message: Welcome to Outside YouTube Player Bar!

popup_description.message: Please contact GitHub Issue about this extension. Maintenance is handled on a best-effort basis.

popup_pleaseReview.message: Please review if you don't mind.

popup_pleaseReviewLink.message: Write a review at the chrome web store

metawords_defaultView.description: the default view of the video player mode

metawords_theaterMode.description: the theater mode of the video player mode

metawords_fullscreen.description: the fullscreen of the video player mode

settings_title.message: Settings for Outside YouTube Player Bar

settings_metaOption_forceDisable_descrip.message: Use this feature if the extension is not working or if it is causing issues with YouTube's UI or functionality, and you want to temporarily disable it.

settings_metaOption_forceDisable_activat.message: Force the extension to disable (this screen will be closed).
settings_metaOption_forceDisable_activat.description: alert of the activate force disable

settings_metaOption_forceDisable_deactiv.message: Reload the extension to deactivate the forced disable (this screen will be closed).
settings_metaOption_forceDisable_deactiv.description: alert of the deactivate force disable

settings_userOption_behaviors_title.message: Default settings for each player mode
settings_userOption_behaviors_title.description: settings extension behavor of the each player modes

settings_userOption_alwaysDisplayPlayerB.message: Always display player bar (only effective when outside)
CPU usage increase due to specifications. If the browser is slow that recommended to turn OFF.
settings_userOption_alwaysDisplayPlayerB.description: always display player bar caution that cpu usage bumping

settings_userOption_inheritPositionPlaye.message: Switching to $MODE$: Inherit the position of the player bar before switching.
settings_userOption_inheritPositionPlaye.description: if video mode changed to $MODE$, inherit the position before switching

settings_userOption_inheritPositionPlaye.message: If turned ON, prioritize the position before switching over the default setting.

settings_userOption_showOpenSettingsIcon.message: Display open settings icon on the player bar
settings_userOption_showOpenSettingsIcon.description: Display open settings icon on the playerbar

settings_userOption_showOpenSettingsIcon.message: â€» After disabling this, to re-open the settings, click the extension icon in the browser or open the options from the browser's extension management page.
settings_userOption_showOpenSettingsIcon.description: How to re-open guide that after disabled
